question:
‘Car
bon border agreements’, which was making news recently, has been proposed by which global association?
explanation:
The European Commission released the European Green Deal in December 2020 and set a deadline of March 2021 to propose the first-ever European Climate Law.
The document highlights plans to implement a carbon border agreement. It aims to avoid carbon leakage from less determined nations who are likely to continue depending on fossil-fuel based energy sources.
